verses.verse: Follow after <S%G1377><s%> love <S%G26><s%>; yet <S%G1161><s%> desire <S%G2206><s%> earnestly spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gifts <S%G1161><s%>, but rather <S%G3123><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may prophesy <S%G4395><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that speaketh <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> understandeth <S%G191><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> he speaketh <S%G2980><s%> mysteries <S%G3466><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> prophesieth <S%G4395><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%> edification <S%G3619><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> consolation <S%G3889><s%>.

He that <S%G3588><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> edifieth <S%G3618><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> prophesieth <S%G4395><s%> edifieth <S%G3618><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>.

Now I would <S%G2309><s%> have you <S%G5209><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye should prophesy <S%G4395><s%>: and <S%G1063><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> is he that <S%G3588><s%> prophesieth <S%G4395><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>, except1487, 3361 he interpret <S%G1329><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> edifying <S%G3619><s%>.

But now <S%G3570><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall I profit <S%G5623><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, unless1437, 3361 I speak <S%G2980><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> either <S%G2228><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> way of revelation <S%G602><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> prophesying <S%G4394><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>?

Even <S%G3676><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> without life <S%G895><s%>, giving <S%G1325><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> pipe <S%G836><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> harp <S%G2788><s%>, if they give <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G3361><s%> distinction <S%G1293><s%> in the sounds <S%G5353><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall it be known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is piped <S%G832><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> harped <S%G2789><s%>?

For1063, 2532 if <S%G1437><s%> the trumpet <S%G4536><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> an uncertain <S%G82><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> shall prepare himself <S%G3903><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> war <S%G4171><s%>?

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, unless <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> utter <S%G1325><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the tongue <S%G1100><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> easy <S%G2154><s%> to be <S%G2071><s%> understood <S%G2154><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall it be known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is spoken <S%G2980><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> ye will be speaking <S%G2980><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the air <S%G109><s%>.

There are <S%G2076><s%>, it may <S%G1487><s%> be <S%G5177><s%>, so many <S%G5118><s%> kinds <S%G1085><s%> of voices <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> kind <S%G846><s%> is without signification <S%G880><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the meaning <S%G1411><s%> of the voice <S%G5456><s%>, I shall be <S%G2071><s%> to him <S%G3588><s%> that speaketh <S%G2980><s%> a barbarian <S%G915><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that speaketh <S%G2980><s%> will be a barbarian <S%G915><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, since <S%G1893><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> of spiritual <S%G4151><s%> gifts <S%G2212><s%>, seek that <S%G2443><s%> ye may abound <S%G4052><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the edifying <S%G3619><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G1355><s%> let him <S%G3588><s%> that speaketh <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may interpret <S%G1329><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I pray <S%G4336><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> prayeth <S%G4336><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? I will pray <S%G4336><s%> with the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I will pray <S%G4336><s%> with the understanding <S%G3563><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>: I will sing <S%G5567><s%> with the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I will sing <S%G5567><s%> with the understanding <S%G3563><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

Else <S%G1893><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou bless <S%G2127><s%> with the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall <S%G378><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> filleth <S%G378><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> of the unlearned <S%G2399><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> the Amen <S%G281><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> giving of thanks <S%G2169><s%>, seeing <S%G1894><s%> he knoweth <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thou sayest <S%G3004><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> givest thanks <S%G2168><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> is <S%G3618><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> edified <S%G3618><s%>.
I thank2168, 3450 God <S%G2316><s%>, I speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%> more than <S%G3123><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>:

howbeit <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> I had rather <S%G2309><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might instruct <S%G2727><s%> others <S%G243><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> ten thousand <S%G3463><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a tongue <S%G1100><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> in mind <S%G5424><s%>: yet <S%G235><s%> in malice <S%G2549><s%> be ye babes <S%G3515><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> in mind <S%G5424><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> men <S%G5046><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> it is written <S%G3754><s%>, By <S%G1722><s%> men of strange tongues <S%G2084><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the lips <S%G5491><s%> of strangers <S%G2087><s%> will I speak <S%G2980><s%> unto this <S%G5129><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> even thus <S%G3779><s%> will they <S%G1522><s%> hear <S%G1522><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> prophesying <S%G4394><s%> is for a sign <S%G571><s%>, not to the <S%G3588><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> be assembled together <S%G4905><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> there come in <S%G1525><s%> men unlearned <S%G2399><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%>, will they <S%G2046><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye are mad <S%G3105><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> there come in <S%G1525><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unlearned <S%G2399><s%>, he is reproved <S%G1651><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, he is judged <S%G350><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>;

the <S%G2532><s%> secrets <S%G2927><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> are <S%G1096><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> he will fall down <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, declaring <S%G518><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> indeed <S%G3689><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>? When <S%G3752><s%> ye come together <S%G4905><s%>, each one <S%G1538><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> a psalm <S%G5568><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> a teaching <S%G1322><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> a revelation <S%G602><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> a tongue <S%G1100><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> an interpretation <S%G2058><s%>. Let <S%G1096><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> edifying <S%G3619><s%>.

If <S%G1535><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a tongue <S%G1100><s%>, let it be by <S%G303><s%> two <S%G1417><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> at the most <S%G4118><s%> three <S%G5140><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that in turn <S%G3313><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G1329><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> interpret <S%G1329><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> there be <S%G5600><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> interpreter <S%G1328><s%>, let him keep silence <S%G4601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> let him speak <S%G2980><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.

And let <S%G1161><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> by two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G1252><s%> the others <S%G243><s%> discern <S%G1252><s%>.
But if <S%G1437><s%> a revelation <S%G601><s%> be made to another <S%G243><s%> sitting by <S%G2521><s%>, let <S%G4601><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> keep silence <S%G4601><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye all <S%G3956><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> may learn <S%G3129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> may be exhorted <S%G3870><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> the spirits <S%G4151><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to the prophets <S%G4396><s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a God of confusion <S%G181><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%>. As <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>,

let the <S%G5216><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> keep silence <S%G4601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2010><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> permitted <S%G2010><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> let them be in subjection <S%G5293><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> they would <S%G2309><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%>, let them ask <S%G1905><s%> their <S%G2398><s%> own husbands <S%G435><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> home <S%G3624><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> shameful <S%G150><s%> for a woman <S%G1135><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>.

What <S%G2228><s%>? was it from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> that the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> came it <S%G2658><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> thinketh himself <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%>, let him take knowledge <S%G1921><s%> of the things <S%G3739><s%> which <S%G3754><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that they are <S%G1526><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> is ignorant <S%G50><s%>, let him be ignorant <S%G50><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%>, my brethren <S%G80><s%>, desire earnestly <S%G2206><s%> to prophesy <S%G4395><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>.
But let all things <S%G3956><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> decently <S%G2156><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> order <S%G5010><s%>.
